subject: Sex Crimes
Colleges and Universities
College Athletics
Perjury
lead_paragraph: The three former university officials, including the former president Graham B. Spanier, are charged with perjury, conspiracy and other crimes in the Jerry Sandusky case.
snippet: The three former university officials, including the former president Graham B. Spanier, are charged with perjury, conspiracy and other crimes in the Jerry Sandusky case.
